column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Honestly it isn't THE best breakfast place
column2: but I still like it. I loved the decor
column3: simple and cute. I ordered a waffle with strawberries and a side of bacon. My friend had an omelet we both enjoyed our meals and the waiter was nice. The only thing that would keep me coming back is knowing that I will be treated nicely. This place is like
column4: I want breakfast and I'm in the area. I will back someday even though I have my other top choices for breakfast.
